thread.title: Teddy Bridgewater Posted Video Of Him Throwing A Football...And It's On His VERIFIED Instagram Account!! | Vikings Blog | KFAN FM 100.3
thread.title_full: Teddy Bridgewater Posted Video Of Him Throwing A Football...And It's On His VERIFIED Instagram Account!! | Vikings Blog | KFAN FM 100.3

title: Teddy Bridgewater Posted Video Of Him Throwing A Football...And It's On His VERIFIED Instagram Account!! | Vikings Blog | KFAN FM 100.3
text:
Teddy Bridgewater Posted Video Of Him Throwing A Football...And It's On His VERIFIED Instagram Account!! posted by Alexander Shun - 
Alexander Shun | @alexpshun 
Digital Content Manager | KFAN.com 
Minnesota Vikings quarterback Teddy Bridgewater is taking steps towards getting back on the football field and he posted video proving that on Tuesday. 
On Bridgewater's official and verified Instagram account, the Vikings quarterback posted video of him dropping back and throwing a football, the first such video anyone has seen since his devastating ACL injury last season. 
Check out the video below. So this surfaced on Reddit today. Appears to be Teddy Bridgewater dropping back and throwing. #Vikings pic.twitter.com/KJlyUJu1BZ â€” Cameron DaSilva (@camdasilva) March 28, 2017 
Bridgewater's Instagram account was public but has since gone private. The video, posted on his Instagram story, is captioned "Spring Cleaning," before Bridgewater comes into frame. 
There is still no timetable as to when Bridgewater will return to the team or how healthy his knee truly is, but it is certainly positive to see him dropping back again. Check out Vikings.com for more information and Minnesota Vikings coverage throughout the year! Contact
